response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is valued at $12,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I'm offering it to you for $11,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
